query: Who is the individual alleged to have built a thriving crypto exchange on falsehoods and is accused by the prosecution of committing fraud for personal gain, as reported by both Fortune and TechCrunch?
answer:
Sam Bankman-Fried (SBF)

Context:
Fortune article titled "Sam Bankman-Fried's FTX Is the Fastest Growing Crypto Exchange in the World" - https://fortune.com/2021/09/27/sam-bankman-fried-ftx-crypto-exchange-fastest-growing/

TechCrunch article titled "FTX's Sam Bankman-Fried on the Future of Crypto, Regulation and His Unusual Path to Success" - https://techcrunch.com/2021/09/27/ftxs-sam-bankman-fried-on-the-future-of-crypto-regulation-and-his-unusual-path-to-success/

Both articles were published on September 27, 2021. The context does not mention any fraud allegations against SBF at the time of these articles. However, subsequent events have led to accusations of fraud and misconduct by various sources, including the U.S. Department of Justice.
